financial-services-ai.title: Financial Services - AI & Data Transformation
financial-services-ai.description: Recommended modules for financial services prospects exploring AI and data modernization

modules.notes: Start with broad introduction to our Data & AI practice - establish credibility and comprehensive capabilities.
Build foundation understanding - most AI/data initiatives require modern architecture as prerequisite.
Address the compliance elephant in the room - critical for financial services before any AI discussion.
First success story - practical AI application with clear ROI that feels achievable and non-threatening.
Now that we've proven AI works, introduce more advanced LLM capabilities and enterprise implementation.
Second success story - shows broader AI applications in their core business (compliance/regulatory).
Final conversation - how do we execute this? Address the talent/resource question once interest is established.
